scripts.run-newman-report: newman run marvel.postman.json -n 5 --insecure -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export ./report/report.html && npm run open-report
scripts.run-newman-influx: newman run marvel.postman.json -n 5 --insecure -r htmlextra,influxdb --reporter-htmlextra-export ./report/report.html --reporter-influxdb-server localhost --reporter-influxdb-port 8086 --reporter-influxdb-name newman --reporter-influxdb-measurement api_results && npm run open-report
scripts.convert-test-content: portman --cliOptionsFile config/portman-cli-options.json --portmanConfigFile config/portman-config-test-content.yaml --collectionName 'Marvel Universe API - Test Content' --syncPostman true
scripts.convert-test-fuzzing: portman --cliOptionsFile config/portman-cli-options.json --portmanConfigFile config/portman-config-test-fuzzing.yaml --collectionName 'Marvel Universe API - Test Fuzzing' --syncPostman true
